text: Maze umwe muri ba bagore babiri aza amusanga afite isoni, aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri data araguhamagaye kugira ngo aguhe igihembo cy’uko watwuhiriye (amatungo).” Nuko (Musa aramwitaba) amugezeho amubarira inkuru (y’ibyamubayeho), maze aramubwira ati “Ntugire ubwoba! Ukize abantu b’inkozi z’ibibi.”
